SELECT
FROM t_hvac_node thn LEFT JOIN t_hvac_point thp ON thn.id=thp.node_id AND thp.is_active=1 LEFT JOIN t_hvac_field thf ON thp.field_id = thf.id AND thn.device_id=thf.device_id AND thf.is_active=1 WHERE thn.is_active=1 AND thn.device_id=#{deviceId}
